name: sfchronicle
text:

• Students' temperatures taken every morning
• Teachers should wear face masks, shields
• Desks should be 6 feet apart, separated by partitions or staggered

text:
SF released guidance on social interactions as the city prepares to reopen:
▪️Outdoor activities are safest
▪️Wear a mask indoors
▪️Avoid using other people's bathrooms
▪️Hang out with as few people as possible
▪️Avoid singing or shouting https://t.co/ZmYxeMmiAi

name: sfchronicle
text:
